Navigate to other release versions of Doxee Platform Business Designer

[6.6](https://docs.doxee.com/docs/en/business-designer-6-6)

[6.7](https://docs.doxee.com/docs/en/business-designer-6-7)

Comments are texts that are not included when rendering the document. The texts wonâ€™t appear in the PDF or in the XSL-FO code. This allows you to insert internal comments on the use of the template.

Creating Comments:

- Drag a comment element into the template

![](data:image/png;base64,)

- Click the element symbol

- Enter the comment in the input field and save by clicking on *Done *or pressing Enter.

![](data:image/png;base64,)

> Note

*In the settings [Symbol] you can choose to hide or show the comment texts. When the comments are hidden, you will only see small placeholders, but you can still click and modify them from the editor.*
